Posters explaining the main climatic features of the Earth continental areas in light of the global atmospheric circulation, made at the Laboratory of Climatology of U. Liège from the work of BAC3 students: Posters_OMP.pdf
Posters are displayed at the Observatoire du monde des plantes de l’Université de Liège.
